purpose.title: 1.2. Purpose
purpose.description: "Madridista Hub" (hereinafter, "the Website") acts as a hub for Real Madrid related content, allowing users to:

purpose.feature2: Create user profiles and manage favorites lists.
purpose.feature3: Possibly link to an online store on another domain.
purpose.feature4: Access subscription services with additional paid features.
purpose.acceptance: The use of the Website grants the status of User and expresses full and unreserved acceptance of all the points contained in this legal document.
